name: Flip (itch) (miopeuhnu)
description:
I decided to use this as a learning experience for 2d platforming in unity. it was a little stressful trying to implement it all in time, and kind of looks like butt, but it isn't bad for a first time. Everything was made by me a la pixel art and some weird settings that I half understood as well as some previous C++ and music making experience. I cannot stress enough how terrible it looks but I cannot help but be bad at making

I made it in 2 hrs and 56 minutes (almost 57 min)
